name: Ley Line Disorder: Lightweight Defense
description:
When Action Phase begins: Grant 6 points of Shield to defend your active character, though this Shield cannot block Elemental Burst DMG.
After the opposing character uses an Elemental Burst: Remove this Shield.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When Action Phase begins:</color> Grant <color=#FFFFFFFF>6 points of $[K6]</color> to defend your active character, though this $[K6] cannot block Elemental Burst DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the opposing character uses an Elemental Burst:</color> Remove this $[K6].
